title: Hoppity Goes to Town (1941, NTA reprint of "Mr. Bug Goes to Town")

sources.title: Hoppity Goes to Town (1941, NTA reprint of "Mr. Bug Goes to Town")
sources.description: An NTA reprint of Mr. Bug Goes to Town from the 1970's, the second and last animated feature film by Fleischer Studios for Paramount Pictures in 1941.
